entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
